transArray.content: Very satisfied. The hotel service staff are friendly and the overall environment is clean.

Dear guest, thank you for your support and trust in us. The hotel is very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and can be reached without taking a car. It is also very close to Joy City and is very convenient for shopping and food. Our breakfast is a Chinese and Western buffet. There are many varieties, including Beijingâ€™s special snacks. We look forward to your coming here often.
